name: Gravity Rush (itch) (BigSlamStudios)
description:
Welcome to our page for our entry for the of the epic Gamejam : Running out of Space

Unfortunatelly due to bad internet connection that we didn't calculate for, we missed the deadline by 5 minutes, regardless, feel free to play:)

ART: Michael Tavernier
CODE: Florian Gaeremynck
SOUNDTRACK: Alexandre Carvalho
